question:
Your friend wants to send her/his children to your house for the weekend. Write a letter to him/her and say 
*Agree to this arrangement.
*Say what time is suitable for you.
*Describe what you are planning to do.
text: I hope you are healthy and safe. It was really great to hear from you after such a long time. Today I am writing this letter to inform you that, I would love to have Gia and Tanay over for the weekend.

To embark with, you know how much I love children. I am looking forward to having a splendid time with them. These days, I am on the morning shift, thus you can drop both of them anytime after 2:00 pm. I will be available and please tell me their favourite dishes as I can cook for them.

In addition, I have planned a number of things. On Friday evening I will play a movie which is called Mouna. Moreover, on Saturday I will take them to the ice-cream parlour then the national zoo. Furthermore, I have much more planning for them, near my house a new Park had built I will take them there.
Last but not the least, at night I will take them to a restaurant for the dinner. I think it will give them refreshment and fun.
No more today, hope to see you soon.
